referenceList: In the WHO list of Essential Medicines 2021
therapeuticAction: Antiviral medicine active against herpes virus
instructions: For the prevention and treatment of neonatal herpes keratitis, ganciclovir may temporarily replace aciclovir in case of supply constraints
isRelatedTo:
DEXOGANC1G-
STD GANCICLOVIR, 0.15%, eye gel, sterile

description: TEAM TENT dome type, 4m², for 2 persons
form: Basic camping tent set, from 4 m² to 6 m² floor surface, dome type is strongly recommended, with inner tent + ground sheet, pegs, rope and storage bag. Per set of a tent + accessories.
fit: Suitable to sleep in with 2 persons.
function: Used for teams spending nights out, in locations with no housing, such as in exploratory missions.
